content: Hi all, As the title of the topic says, I would like to know, how can I increase the dataverse value per page to display?
@Santiago Florez can you please show a screenshot? I'm not sure what you mean.

Do you mean the number of dataverses per page ?
On this topic you might want to have a look at the demo of the future user interface (SPA) which nolonger has pages of dataverses but an infinite scroll :)
